description:
The Versus EVO line has a refined base, padding, and a central channel that aims to increase comfort while reducing surface contact. A strong saddle that suits truly powerful road riders, it uses the Spine Concept System, which tunes each style to a specific range of flexibility. The Aliante features the Bull style for riders who rotate their pelvis forward and sit in the pocket of the saddle with the sit bones on the back. Bull riders benefit from a saddle that provides pressure relief.

  • K:ium rail is light, strong and provides a stiff connection between the shell and the seatpost
  • Carbon-injected nylon shell brings stiffness and power transfer
  • Versus Evo channel is designed to provide more comfort in the riding position
  • Comfort Core foam is bonded on the shell to allow for natural movement
name: Fizik Aliante R3 Versus EVO Saddle - Unisex
